content:
I noticed that "ServiceRequest" is shown in both the "Clinical" and "Workflow" groups on the front page of the FHIR documentation). Also, it's called "Referral" under workflow instead of "ServiceRequest". Is this correct?

Screenshot: https://www.screencast.com/t/IflCjXODNka
Good catch! Can you open up a change request for it?

Actually, that's not an error. It's intended to show in both groups - and we sometimes futz the names a bit on the home page to be the names people are likely to look for - rather than the formal names (see 'Allergy' and 'Problem' under Clinical as another example).
The groups aren't strict hierarchies. They're navigation tools to help people find common things quickly and easily.
